page.title: 17EMPLOYMENT IN PAXFORD AREA
page.content: In this rural area where many people are retired, most of the working population is employed on the land. Some people are self employed, and some find work in other areas. A large number of women in the area work. Campden Food Preservation Research Association, a service industry to food manufacturers and processers, employs 123 permanent and some seasonal part time workers. A garden centre, The crafts of wheelwrighting and fencemaking also offer employment. Agricultural workers earn Â£90 for an approximate 40hr. week. Many vegetable and fruit farmers employ students, travellers and foreign immigrants from areas of high industrial unemployment on a seasonal basis.
